QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT DISTINCT mce.PATID, mce.YRDOB, mce.GDR_CD, me.ELIGEFF, me.ELIGEND, CASE WHEN me.eligeff < '05/01/2000' THEN '05/01/2000' ELSE me.eligeff END as startDate, 32813 as PeriodTypeConceptId, CASE me.race WHEN 'W' THEN 8527 WHEN 'A' THEN 8515 WHEN 'U' THEN 0 WHEN 'H' THEN 0 WHEN 'B' THEN 8516 ELSE 0 END as RaceConceptId, CASE me.race WHEN 'W' THEN 38003564 WHEN 'A' THEN 38003564 WHEN 'U' THEN 0 WHEN 'H' THEN 38003563 WHEN 'B' THEN 38003564 ELSE 0 END as EthnicityConceptId, CASE me.race WHEN 'W' THEN me.race WHEN 'A' THEN me.race WHEN 'B' THEN me.race ELSE NULL END AS RACE, CASE me.race WHEN 'H' THEN me.race ELSE NULL END AS ETHNICITY, {location},
case when me.bus = 'MCR' then 281 when me.health_exch = '1' then 275 when me.health_exch in ('2','3') then 276 when me.bus = 'COM' then 327 else 0 end as PAYER_CONCEPT_ID, CONCAT(me.bus, me.health_exch) as PAYER_SOURCE_VALUE, CONCAT(me.product, me.cdhp) as PLAN_SOURCE_VALUE, CONCAT(me.aso, me.group_nbr) as SPONSOR_SOURCE_VALUE, me.family_id as FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.MEMBER_CONTINUOUS_ENROLLMENT mce JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND mce.PATID = ch.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN {sc}.MEMBER_ENROLLMENT me ON mce.PATID = me.PATID ), a2 as ( SELECT DISTINCT mce.PATID, mce.YRDOB, CASE WHEN me.eligeff < '05/01/2000' THEN '05/01/2000' ELSE me.eligeff END as startDate, me.family_id as FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.MEMBER_CONTINUOUS_ENROLLMENT mce LEFT JOIN {sc}.MEMBER_ENROLLMENT me ON mce.PATID = me.PATID )
select a.*, m2.patid as baby_person_id, case when DATE_PART('year', m2.startDate) = m2.yrdob then min(m2.startDate) else min(CAST((CAST(m2.yrdob AS VARCHAR) || '-' || DATE_PART('MONTH', m2.startDate) || '-01') AS DATE)) end as baby_dob from a left join a2 m2 on a.patid != m2.patid and a.gdr_cd = 'F' and a.FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE is not null and a.FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE = m2.FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE and m2.yrdob - DATE_PART('YEAR', m2.startDate) = 0 group by a.patid, a.yrdob, a.gdr_cd, a.eligeff, a.eligend, a.startdate, a.periodtypeconceptid, a.raceconceptid, a.ethnicityconceptid, a.race, a.ethnicity, a.location, a.PAYER_CONCEPT_ID, a.PAYER_SOURCE_VALUE, a.PLAN_SOURCE_VALUE, a.SPONSOR_SOURCE_VALUE, a.FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE, baby_person_id, m2.yrdob, m2.startDate order by a.PATID
